TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Seveng, title = Seveng, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seveng} }

S.FORM: Seveng Itiniay i Chunri Cen no Pingtung ko Seveng a niyaro', 90 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 401 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 395 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan97%, Bunun1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Seveng Itiniay i Chonri Cen no Pingtong ko Seveng a niyaro', 90 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 401 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 395 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 6 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan97%, Bonon1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
